entry.title: [CW] I've just published the [fourth post](https://firsttoilthenthegrave.substack.com
entry.content: I've just published the [fourth post](https://firsttoilthenthegrave.substack.com/p/pay-no-attention-to-that-opinion) on my blog ([first](https://firsttoilthenthegrave.substack.com/p/the-blacks-of-ireland-the-blacks-of-america), [second](https://firsttoilthenthegrave.substack.com/p/unfalsifiable-aesthetics), [third](https://firsttoilthenthegrave.substack.com/p/an-open-letter-to-orla-obrien-chief)). It's a dissection of a minor controversy which erupted last weekend at an Irish music festival. I use the controversy as a jumping-off point to describe a style of journalism I really can't stand, in which the journalist describes Person X as holding Bad Opinions without giving their readers any indication about the actual content of those opinions (other than that they are Bad).
